pageContent: Objective: To assess differences in trends for prostate cancer mortality, radical prostatectomy and prostate-specific antigen (PSA) testing for Australian men aged 50-79 years living in capital cities compared with regional and rural areas.

metaData.source:
Living with prostate cancer: patients' and spouses' psychosocial status and quality of life
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/17635953/
